FAQs About WordPress Development Services!

Why should I choose a WordPress platform for website development?

There are many perks of choosing WordPress for website development like the website built on WordPress is completely customizable, and the themes and plugins in WordPress can help you build the website of your choice. It is open-source software, it is easy to use, easy to maintain, and more.

Do I need to learn PHP first to be an expert in WordPress?

In order to be perfect in WordPress you need not know PHP. However, there are certain plug-ins that require you to have some gist of PHP.

Is it possible to make an e-commerce site using WordPress?

Yes, one can easily run an online store using WordPress. All you need to do is, use WooCommerce, which is the open-source e-commerce plug-in for WordPress. It is designed for small to large-sized online merchants using WordPress.

Why should I rely upon Rankon Technologies for WordPress Website Development?

Rankon Technologies is one of the most prominent WordPress website development companies in India that has made hundreds of WordPress websites in various niches for different businesses.

Is there an industry-standard package for WordPress Website development?

Unfortunately, there isn’t any industry-standard package for WordPress website development. As of this reason, many WordPress website development companies demand high prices for their services. However, Rankon Technologies is a highly dependable WordPress website development company that gives unmatched WordPress Website development services at highly cost-effective prices.
